title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```


The input is tricky this time:

```{r}
bingo <- readLines("data/input4a.txt") 

nums_drawn <- bingo[1] %>%
  strsplit(",") %>%
  unlist() %>%
  as.numeric()

boards <- bingo[-1]
boards <- boards[boards!=""]  
num_boards <- floor(length(boards)/5)

board_entries <- boards %>%
  strsplit("\\D+") %>%
  unlist() %>%
  as.numeric() %>%
  na.omit()

all_boards <- list()
for (iboard in 1:num_boards) { 
  all_boards[iboard] <- matrix( 
    board_entries[(1:25)+(iboard-1)*25], # the data elements 
    nrow=5,              # number of rows 
    ncol=5,              # number of columns 
    byrow = TRUE) 
}
```
